item.title: Valid Sql?
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Is this valid msql from java?

	MySQL.update("CREATE TABLE "+uid+
	           "(account varchar," +
                "char varchar,"+
                "equip varchar,"+
                "look int,"+
                "skill int,"+
                "xp int,"+
                "item_id int,"+
                "item_Amount int,"+
                "bank_id int, "+
                "bank_Amount int,"+
                "friends int,"+
                "friends_ignore int)");

Thats how my accounts are going to be saved, but i get an error.

Read full topic
